original_title: La Navidad en el Museo del Prado
overview: Christmas through the works of the Prado Museum. With works by Rafael, El Greco, Fra Angelico, Fernando Yáñez, Juan de Juanes, Patinir, Murillo, El Bosco, Federico Barocci, Maíno, Velázquez, Gerard David and Luis de Morales.
title: Christmas at the Prado Museum
